Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: William Kingston
Reviews.Content: This unit is exactly what I wanted. It has the large monitor, the number keyboard, full letter key board, etc.

Reviews.Title: In Good condition
Reviews.Author: Kitty Bartholomew
Reviews.Content: Works well, came quick and in good condition. I have been using it for a while now and everything is great.

ProductInfo.Features:
AMD A4-3305M Accelerated Processor with AMD Radeon HD 6480G discrete-class graphics
4 GB DDR3 System Memory, 320GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive, 17.3" LED-backlit high-definition widescreen display With BrightView technology and 1600 x 900 resolution showcases movies and games in stunning clarity.
6 Cell Lithium Ion Battery, Keyboard, 3 high-speed USB 2.0 ports For fast digital video, audio and data transfer, Built-in 10/100Base-T Ethernet LAN
AMD Radeon HD 6480G discrete-class graphics Feature up to 2037MB total video memory for lush images. HDMI output for connection to an HDTV, Multiformat DVD burner
Windows 7 Home Premium Edition 64-bit operating system preinstalled, Webcam with Integrated Digital Microphone, Wireless 802.11b/g/n WLAN
ProductInfo.Name: HP Pavilion g7-1320dx Laptop - Windows 7 Premium, AMD A4-3305M 1.9GHz, 4GB Memory, 320GB HDD, AMD Radeon HD 6480 Graphics, DVD Burner, 17.3" HD Screen
